attributes.action: To stop the casualisation of Great Yarmouth Docks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yourselves and the Port Of Singapore Authority have been involved in the construction of a new container port at Great Yarmouth. It has now been announced that the permanently employed workforce ( some with 20 years service plus ) are going to made redundant and replaced with casual / agency labour.
